title: Flower Pow
summaries: The Flower Pow is a Hardmode flail which is dropped by Plantera with a 14.29*1/7 (14.29%) / 16.67*1/6 (16.67%) chance. In addition to the usual flail mechanics, it has the unique ability to shoot petals toward enemies. It will launch the petals at a steady, rapid pace for as long as the âš’ Use / Attack button is held and there are unobstructed targets to shoot at. Dropping the flail head to the ground mid-throw will cause the fire rate of its petals to increase drastically.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Damage: 130 / 52 (Melee)
statistics.Tooltip: Shoots razor sharp flower petals at nearby enemies
